items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fur is detachable!
items.body: Love this! The fur is actually detachable so you can wear with or without. Read more
items.author: C. Callahan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and warm!
items.body: This sweater dress is comfortable and warm... it's perfect for chilly days! The material is thick, stretchy, and feels wonderfully soft. It fits me nicely and as expected. The shape of the hips is designed to fit curves which is a neat feature. The reason I'm dropping a star is because the fur trim at the neckline is kind of wonky. It's removable which is a fantastic option... there are buttons and elastic loops that hold the trim on. The thing is that the trim wiggles and shows the neckline of the dress itself which I don't care for. Overall, it's a pretty dress and the quality is good... it's great for staying warm while being stylish! Read more
items.author: Cinnamon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Money well spent.
items.body: Fits like a glove. Beautiful and elegant. Read more
items.author: renata b.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!!
items.body: So pretty, and fits beautifully. Decent quality, stretching and bang for your buck. Reasonably comfortable as well. Read more
items.author: M. I.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars I sent it back
items.body: Looked super cheap and thin Read more
items.author: Crystal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Review for ZESICA Fall Winter Sweater Dress
items.body: Style: Super sexy, off-shoulder design with faux fur and side slit, ideal for holidays and parties. Fit: True to size. Rating: 5 stars. Recommendation: Great choice for a stylish, festive look at holiday events. Read more
items.author: John

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fuzz is entirely for show, there's no lining
items.body: The images for this dress feel deceptive. On the one hand, this is a comfortable dress. I actually like the look of it, I feel like if you've got a winter formal type event this would be a perfect dress ... assuming that you are inside and it's going to be warm. If you're like me, you might look at the photos and assume the fuzz at the top and the collars implies there's a fuzzy soft material lining the inside keeping you nice and toasty. And uh. Nope. They are stitched on the top and the cuffs. They're not even super sewn in, there's maybe a handful of short strings connecting the fuzzy parts to the collar and the cuffs. If you just want the STYLE of the "super warm dress" this has it, but it's disappointing that it's not properly attached. That said, I came back and added a star back so it's now four stars. I spent a day wearing it and it's honestly a genuinely comfortable dress, and the attachments at least are attached by buttons so they can be removed for easy cleaning of the main dress which. Ok. That's a nice touch. I'm still disappointed but I don't hate this nearly as much. Read more
items.author: queerarmorer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Striking off-shoulder dress for wintertime
items.body: The off-shoulder look with the fur trimming around the neckline and at the wrists makes for a striking outfit. This is for when you want to be noticed. The thin vertical stripes of the material and the length of the dress make me look tall and skinny, which I like. The dress is narrow but a side slit that comes to mid-thigh makes it easy to walk in. This dress is warm, but not unreasonably so. It would be reasonable to wear indoors with wintertime thermostat settings, and could be worn outside in the cold. The fur at the shoulder and wrists is buttoned on, so it is easy to remove while you wash the dress itself. In this dress I don't look anywhere near as good as the model who posed for the photos in the product description, but I do look good, and the fur trim really makes the off-shoulder look seem elegant and classy. Read more
items.author: Ray L Burns

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Pink, Sand, Blue, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
